body: My friends want to ban appeal but they need to register an account first. Once they reach Step 2 in registering, they put in the code for the server, get authenticated, but it continues to say "Waiting..." on the Step 2 page. They waited for hours and it still didn't work. Is the problem because they have been banned? It would be good if someone could answer as quick as possible. Thank you. :)
body_tagged: My friends want to ban appeal but they need to register an account first. title: Registering account not working

replies.body: No it's not because they're banned (experience). I personally don't know the reason, maybe your friend can make an appeal at support@avicus.net (email it)
replies.body_tagged: No it's not because they're banned (experience). I personally don't know the reason, maybe your friend can make an appeal at support@avicus.net (email it)

replies.body: So what are they gonna do?

replies.body: As stated by AtditC tell your friends to email avicus at support@avicus.net so they can appeal there ban

replies.body: No it's not! I have registered a banned alt here a few weeks ago (That alt is banned for the same reason as my main account was banned, actually it has to be unbanned but I don't play with it anyways so not going to annoy any Sr Mods.)
